verifyClaim(SortitionPool,EcdsaInactivit.details: Wallet signing group members hash is validated upstream in      `WalletRegistry.notifyOperatorInactivity()`

params.nonce: Current inactivity nonce for wallet used in the claim

returns.inactiveMembers: Identifiers of members who are inactive

groupThreshold().notice: The minimum number of wallet signing group members needed to         interact according to the protocol to produce a valid inactivity         claim.

signatureByteSize().notice: Size in bytes of a single signature produced by member         supporting the inactivity claim.

verifyClaim(SortitionPool,EcdsaInactivit.notice: Verifies the inactivity claim according to the rules defined in         `Claim` struct documentation. Reverts if verification fails.
